rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entry with easy wheelchair access. Features a vestibule for shoe storage and security.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open area with Vastu orientation to the east for positive energy, accommodating joint family gatherings. Wheelchair accessible design with wide doorways and low-level furniture.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Open concept dining area integrated with living space, ensuring smooth flow as per Vastu principles. Accessible layout.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible kitchen designed with an open plan layout to encourage social interaction and efficient workflow. Vastu placement in the south-east for prosperity.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment 1
rooms.description: Triplex studio apartment with a dedicated living, sleeping, and study area. Wheelchair accessible design with adjustable fixtures and clear pathways.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment 2
rooms.description: Triplex studio apartment optimized for privacy and comfort, incorporating Vastu-aligned placement for good energy flow. Wheelchair accessible with adaptable features.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment 3
rooms.description: Triplex studio apartment designed to accommodate joint family members comfortably, featuring a living area, bedroom, and workspace. Fully wheelchair accessible and Vastu compliant.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Entertainment zone integrated within the ground floor with adjustable seating and wide, unobstructed pathways for wheelchair users. Incorporates acoustics optimized to Vastu sound energy principles.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entry point with stepless design.
Accessible two-car garage entrance for family vehicles and maintenance.
Provides connection to outdoor living spaces with ample wheelchair maneuvering space.
